lines.text: What if the <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard</c> cast <c=#FF6000>Portable Hole</c> on the gunshot barrel?
Since it's already a hole, maybe it would... go through the back of the hole... and, uh...
No, it'd... make the hole in the back of the gun, right?
So maybe the bullet would come out the other end and shoot Slick!
...No, it just might be nonsense. That hologram shows us that the bullet came out the front end.
